title: The Rise of AI in India
content: Artificial intelligence is revolutionizing India’s tech landscape. From chatbots in customer service to AI-driven medical diagnostics, India is rapidly adopting AI solutions.
author: Rajesh Kumar

title: Coding Horror
content: Jeff Atwood discusses programming, software development, and the human factors involved in creating software.
author: Jeff Atwood

title: The Pragmatic Engineer
content: Gergely Orosz provides detailed articles on software engineering practices, career advice, and industry trends.
author: Gergely Orosz

title: India’s Ambition for Space: ISRO’s Future Missions
content: After Chandrayaan and Gaganyaan, ISRO is aiming for more interplanetary missions. Will India be the next big player in space exploration?
author: AstroPriya

title: Top 5 VS Code Extensions for Indian Developers
content: Tools like Prettier, Live Server, and GitLens are widely used among Indian developers to streamline coding and debugging processes.
author: DevAnkit

title: The Truth About Cars
content: Founded by Robert Farago in 2002, this blog offers candid, unbiased automobile reviews and industry news.
author: Robert Farago

title: College vs University
content: Colleges typically specialize in specific fields of study, while universities offer a wider range of academic disciplines. Colleges are generally smaller in size with a limited student population, whereas universities are larger with a more diverse student body.
author: Samarth Gupta
